1). I pray that all the happiness be showered on your family and your flourish with joy and prosperity. Happy Good Friday.


2). Sending you the warmest wishes to your family on the occasion of Good Friday. Happy Good Friday


3). Let us thank God for giving us such a wonderful family and understand the value of love. Happy Good Friday


4). I pray that may your life is bestowed with the grace, mercy and love of Lord. May you thank Him and find the path of glory and success. Wishing you blessed and Happy Good Friday.


5). Let us thank for God for all his love for the world for which he gave away his only son. Let us pray him for a meaningful life with a purpose. Warm best wishes on Holy Friday.


6). He is the one who bore all our sins in his body so that we can live for righteousness. He took wounds on his body so that we could get healed. Happy Good Friday wishes to you.


7). On Holy Friday, may his love grace our hearts, may his light guide our path, may his sacrifice impart strength to our souls. Wishing you Happy Good Friday. May God bless us all.


8). May the blessings of Jesus shine on our lives on this Holy day. May He showers his love on all of us and guide us towards the path of righteousness. Warm Blessed Happy Good Friday wishes.


9). I am praying to the Lord that holds you in his love and blesses your life with his grace every day. Warm wishes on Holy Friday to you. May God bless us with his love.
